attributes.action: Ask Parliament to remove Speaker Martin and appoint a new Speaker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament sits with the consent of the electorate only. The Speaker must command the confidence of both Parliament and the electorate. The current Speaker has shown a disregard for the electorate who funds parliamentary allowances and must be replaced to avoid a loss of electoral consent for Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
